shirt.Description: This is a C-Shirt of "The Merge Team" playing at the "Non Fungible Cup" - The first NFT Tournament. Every C-Shirt holders have free-mint, airdrops and other benefits for all Tournaments drops. Minting a Tournament NFT means to start earning ETHs based on related Teams wins in the real world champsionship. More info on: https://cshirts.io
